data.text: We celebrate many festivals every year. Festivals are celebrated on particular days of the year.
Some festivals are related to religions. They are called religious festivals. Followers of every religion have their own special days.
Muslims celebrate Eid-i-Milad-un-Nabi, Eid-ul-Fitr, and Eid-ul-Azha.
Christmas Day is very special for the Christians.
The Hindus have festivals such as Diwali and Holi.
